attributes.action: TELL US how much more ministerial cars will cost taxpayers when you scrap 1st Class on trains.
attributes.additional_details:
This is just another scam to increase the cost of government, just like moving the green taxes from energy bills to general taxation increases the cost to standard rate taxpayers but reduces the cost to politicians who receive advice on how to evade taxes,
free of charge from the taxpayer funded HMRC.  There is ABSOLUTELY nothing our politicians do which does not directly benefit them and increases living costs to the people who put them where they are.
